Metadata.Title: RHSA-2020:0555: virt:8.1 and virt-devel:8.1 security update (Moderate)
Metadata.Description:
The Advanced Virtualization module provides the user-space component for running virtual machines that use KVM hypervisor in environments managed by Red Hat products.

Security Fix(es):

* hw: TSX Transaction Asynchronous Abort (TAA) (CVE-2019-11135)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Criterions.Comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
Module virt:8.1 is enabled
